import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Separate features and target
X = train_df.drop(['PassengerId', 'Survived'], axis=1)
y = train_df['Survived']

# Handle missing values
X['Age'].fillna(X['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
X['Fare'].fillna(X['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
X['Cabin'].fillna('Unknown', inplace=True)
X['Embarked'].fillna(X['Embarked'].mode()[0], inplace=True)

# Encode categorical variables
le_sex = LabelEncoder()
le_embarked = LabelEncoder()

X['Sex'] = le_sex.fit_transform(X['Sex'])
X['Embarked'] = le_embarked.fit_transform(X['Embarked'])

# Create dummy variables for cabin (only first letter for simplicity)
X['Cabin'] = X['Cabin'].str[0] if X['Cabin'].str.len().max() > 0 else 'Unknown'
X['Cabin'] = pd.Categorical(X['Cabin']).codes

# Feature engineering: Family size
X['FamilySize'] = X['SibSp'] + X['Parch'] + 1
X['IsAlone'] = (X['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# Drop unnecessary columns
X = X.drop(['Name', 'Ticket'], axis=1)

# Prepare test data
test_X = test_df.drop(['PassengerId'], axis=1)
test_X['Age'].fillna(test_X['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
test_X['Fare'].fillna(test_X['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
test_X['Cabin'].fillna('Unknown', inplace=True)
test_X['Embarked'].fillna(test_X['Embarked'].mode()[0], inplace=True)

test_X['Sex'] = le_sex.transform(test_X['Sex'])
test_X['Embarked'] = le_embarked.transform(test_X['Embarked'])

test_X['IsAlone'] = (test_X['F

cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Prepare features
X = train_df.drop(['PassengerId', 'Survived'], axis=1)
y = train_df['Survived']

# Fill missing values
X['Age'].fillna(X['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
X['Fare'].fillna(X['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
X['Cabin'].fillna('Unknown', inplace=True)
X['Embarked'].fillna(X['Embarked'].mode()[0], inplace=True)

# Encode categorical variables
le_sex = LabelEncoder()
le_embarked = LabelEncoder()
X['Sex'] = le_sex.fit_transform(X['Sex'])
X['Embarked'] = le_embarked.fit_transform(X['Embarked'])

# Feature engineering
X['FamilySize'] = X['SibSp'] + X['Parch'] + 1
X['IsAlone'] = (X['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# Drop irrelevant columns
X = X.drop(['Name', 'Ticket'], axis=1)

# Prepare test data
test_X = test_df.drop(['PassengerId'], axis=1)
test_X['Age'].fillna(test_X['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
test_X['Fare'].fillna(test_X['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
test_X['Cabin'].fillna('Unknown', inplace=True)
test_X['Embarked'].fillna(test_X['Embarked'].mode()[0], inplace=True)

test_X['Sex'] = le_sex.transform(test_X['Sex'])
test_X['Embarked'] = le_embarked.transform(test_X['Embarked'])
test_X['FamilySize'] = test_X['SibSp'] + test_X['Parch'] + 1
test_X['IsAlone'] = (test_X['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# Train model
model = RandomForestClassifier(n_estimators=100, max_depth=10, random_state=42)
model.fit(X, y)

# Predict
y_pred = model.predict(test_X)

# Create submission
submission = pd.DataFrame({
    'PassengerId': test_df['PassengerId'],
    'Survived': y_pred
})

submission.to_csv('submission.csv', index=False)
ENDOFFILE

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Prepare features
X = train_df.drop(['PassengerId', 'Survived'], axis=1)
y = train_df['Survived']

# Fill missing values
X['Age'].fillna(X['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
X['Fare'].fillna(X['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
X['Cabin'].fillna('Unknown', inplace=True)
X['Embarked'].fillna(X['Embarked'].mode()[0], inplace=True)

# Encode categorical variables
le_sex = LabelEncoder()
le_embarked = LabelEncoder()
X['Sex'] = le_sex.fit_transform(X['Sex'])
X['Embarked'] = le_embarked.fit_transform(X['Embarked'])

# Create cabin category (first letter)
X['Cabin'] = X['Cabin'].str[0] if X['Cabin'].str.len().max() > 0 else 'Unknown'
X['Cabin'] = X['Cabin'].astype('category').cat.codes

# Feature engineering
X['FamilySize'] = X['SibSp'] + X['Parch'] + 1
X['IsAlone'] = (X['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# Drop irrelevant columns

# Prepare test data

test_X['Age'].fillna(test_X['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
test_X['Fare'].fillna(test_X['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
test_X['Cabin'].fillna('Unknown', inplace=True)
test_X['Embarked'].fillna(test_X['Embarked'].mode()[0], inplace=True)

test_X['Cabin'] = test_X['Cabin'].str[0] if test_X['Cabin'].str.len().max() > 0 else 'Unknown'
test_X['Cabin'] = test_X['Cabin'].astype('category').cat.codes

test_X['FamilySize'] = test_X['SibSp'] + test_X['Parch'] + 1
test_X['IsAlone'] = (test_X['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# Ensure consistent encoding for test data using the same encoder
test_X['Sex'] = le_sex.transform(test_X['Sex'])
test_X['Embarked'] = le_embarked.transform(test_X['Embarked'])
